Code style:.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg :target: https://github.com/psf/blackSimple library functions used by other code, and some basic command-line tools.By Rudolf Cardinal (rudolf@pobox.com)Install with ``pip install cardinal_pythonlib``.Documentation is at https://cardinalpythonlib.readthedocs.io/.
